name: Guardians of Life VR
description: Dark magic has been awakened ! The horde of undead skeletons rises and coming for last bastion of life:Tree of Life. Dont let them to enter the castle. Use shield to cover from arrows and axes. Become a Guardian and protect last hope of life !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
